page.title: 02Education in Springfield
page.content: The pupils in{Springfield}school total up to 101 including the nursery.We have one headteacher and four teachers.The headteacher has the infant class in the morning and the nursery teacher takes that class in the afternoon.The visiting teachers are one remedial teacher,one art teacher,one physical education teacher also one drama teacher.There is a visiting library van once every two weeks.We have a small playground but also a large playpark.We have an assembly every two weeks with visiting ministers.The nursery was built in 1977. We will be getting new sinks and new carpets in the near future.We have a part time office auxiliary.There is a school house which is now privately owned.
